website_summaries.verdict: Efficiency and easy power controls makes for simple  cooking with exceptional results.
pros: Comes with chrome accents and a variety of color options to spice up one's kitchen
Designed to prevent food from sticking on its blades
Includes spatula, instruction manual, and recipe book
cons: The cord is long and may get in the way

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Best mixer ever!! Since the beaters don't have that solid metal bar in the middle it doesn't catch the debris and clean up is so much easier! Also it seems to be very strong and has handled cake mix along with cookie dough with no issue. I can see why this product was rated highly on consumer reports, which is why I looked it up for purchase here to begin with. I would buy it again in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Walker

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Last minute Thanksgiving crisis - my hand mixer died, two days prior to the big feast. And I had stuff to blend!! So I ordered this for overnight delivery. I don't know what prompted me to order a pink Cuisinart mixer, but I did, and omg I love it. It's retro-pink, and just adorable! And yes, it mixes wonderfully - it's a Cuisinart, after all! Durable, great settings, everything I need in a hand mixer. And did I say it's adorable? :)
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza

customer_reviews.title: no delicate speed
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love the color, it's the perfect pink, the mixer's lowest setting is too strong and overall it's heavy for tasks that take a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Terri R,

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! Own a kitchen aid stand mixer and ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Own a kitchen aid stand mixer and sometimes I prefer to do it the old fashioned way. This is the perfect hand mixer to do it with... easy to use, quality, and clean up is quick. Plus it's cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i wish i could return too late
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this blender and used it a few times,.,.and realized I HATE IT.. i cant return it cuz the window closed to return. dang. ok it splatters EVERYWHERE and there is no way around it. ive used different bowls, held my hand up to catch the splatter its HORRIBLE..man i loved the color and the brand BUT IT SUCKS!!!! you WILL HATE IT you-are-welcome!
customer_reviews.author: K Jay

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my niece because she likes to DIY her deep conditioners. She said it works perfectly and it allows her to do a variety of deep conditioners that were difficult to bring together by hand (stirring). She's happy so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: LaDana

customer_reviews.title: Use Both Hands to Operate
customer_reviews.text: This mixer goes very fast on Number 1 speed! Do not use this mixer with your good clothes on! You'll need to cover your face and clothes because it goes so fast it slings the batter all over you and the whole kitchen! Every time I use it I promise myself that I'm going to throw it away and get a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Groover

customer_reviews.title: Beware !! Quality is not there
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mixer in June of 2018,I don't use it a lot, maybe a dozen times Tried using it this morning and it started making a grinding noise, then stopped beating Didn't have a slow speed which I didn't like. Would not recommend this mixer
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet. I am sure it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: nycgal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is okay as a backup to stand mixer. It doesn't hav ethe power I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: AMKunst

customer_reviews.title: Love that it is pink and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a few weeks now...working great. Love that it is pink...so girly...lol Powerful, and easy cleaning. The only thing I would say negative, is the blades are thinner then I am use to. Not sure if this is part of the design for a reason...but it does not take away from getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA  SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Pink and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is pink and it is powerful! Very powerful. Huge difference over my old hand mixer. It has several speed levels. I wish it had one or two speeds slower than it is designed with.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Really inconvenient and annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this mixer for 4 months and it has already started malfunctioning. When I try to turn it off, it just keeps going on the lowest setting, and I have to unplug it to make it turn off. Really inconvenient and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned up after only a few uses...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the motor burned up after only a few uses. I only owned the mixer for 6 months and used it approximately once a month. I made cookies once, mashed potatoes twice and baked a couple of cakes and frosted them. I expect more from any mixer but especially from Cuisinart. I've owned several of Cuisinart's other appliances and never had a problem which is one of the reasons I originally went with this mixer. I have requested a return / refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Henry

customer_reviews.title: I was not excited about the new beater shape but the one i have works better than i expected and has not died yet
customer_reviews.text: have one of my own and gifted this to daughter because she loves pink. I was not excited about the new beater shape but the one i have works better than i expected and has not died yet.I have killed more hand mixers than I care to admit.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Great value and cute color
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is a pretty sturdy one. The beaters are easy to clean. Loved the pink color. It’s a tad loud but not out of the ordinary for a hand mixer. Doesn’t have any other attachments but I rarely use them so it’s not a big loss. The spatula it comes with is stiff so it can be hard to scrape a bowl as well as a softer silicone scraper would.
customer_reviews.author: S.Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Not really a 5 speed
customer_reviews.text: Its called a 5 speed mixer, but mine only seems to have one-and it is super fast!! AWESOME for whipping cream-gets the job really quickly. But there is no LOW speed. So the dry ingredients fly all over the counter top until wet and dry ingredients are mixed. I'd like to be able to start on low and gradually increase speed, but this mixer won't let me. It sure is pretty, though, and comfy to hold and easy to clean. From Cuisinart, I expected an actual 5 different speeds.
customer_reviews.author: judy s.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the speed of mixer. It appears to be heavier than other mixers I've purchased but love the quality of it!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was ok, but only lasted 8 months. didn't send in warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer!!! Works well, super fast. Whips really fast. Love it and love the pink color!! Buy it, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Pass this one up
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I liked about this actually tossed it out and bought a cheaper better one .. spats all over when using it
customer_reviews.author: Beverly  Simonelli

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews said there was a low speed but it is not low. It sent flour all over the kitchen counter even at a low speed. Loud, flimsy beaters and not worthy of the Cuisinart label.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defect beaters
customer_reviews.text: Anyone have problems w beaters all of a sudden I can no long put in
customer_reviews.author: Jonna203

customer_reviews.title: An absolute piece of junk, cannot lock in one ...
customer_reviews.text: An absolute piece of junk , cannot lock in one of the beaters. It falls out no matter how many times I try to lock it in. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: kathy michael

customer_reviews.title: Never buy Cuisinart hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April 2017. Only used less than 10 times until tried to use in May 2019 and beater wouldn't turn. Took it apart and found that the gear was already worn out -- see photos. Worm drive chewed up the nylon gear and batter had worked its way into the gears.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: It started off working real good just what I would expect from a Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: It started off working real good just what I would expect from a Cuisinart. I have owned mine 8 months and it just burned out. You can hear the inner workings shaking around. Very disappointed. I had to get my 15 yr old KitchenAid down and finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of this product for two main reasons: the hand held unit will not remain upright when not in use because the cord gets in the way. I don’t have time to adjust the cord every time I want to put it aside for a moment to add more ingredients. The weight distribution is awkward. The second reason I’m not a fan is because when you turn the unit on, it gets a burst of energy, and then slows into the lowest speed setting. This sudden intense burst of speed tends to spray ingredients everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gottaring72

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Power Advantage 5-Speed Pink Hand Mixer, One Size
product_meta.description: Color:PinkThe Cuisinart Power Advantage 5-Speed Hand Mixer is now available in 3 bold new colors. The 5-Speed hand mixer, flawlessly and easily mixes even the heaviest ingredients. From dense cookie dough to whipped cream, the powerful motor can perform any mixing task. And the slide control easily shifts speeds with just one touch! Features: 220 watts of power with automatic feedback|Chrome-plated Cuisinart logo band|Easy-to-use speed control and beater eject lever|Swivel cord for right-handed or left-handed use|Extra-long self cleaning beaters with no center posts|Spatula|Instruction and recipe book included|Limited 3-year warranty|BPA Free
feature_bullets: This year, Cuisinart is donating $32,500, regardless of sales, to the Breast Cancer Research Foundation.
Handheld blender with 220-watt motor and automatic feedback
5 speed options; slide control easily shifts speeds with a single touch
Swivel cord; extra-long dishwasher-safe beaters; beater-eject lever

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
